funding-group.funding-statement: SC is a recipient of the Burroughs Wellcome Investigators in the Pathogenesis of Infectious Disease Award. This work was supported by grants from the National Institutes of Health R01AI074951, U54AI057168, R21AI103441, and RO1AI095500 to SC, R01AI104972 to MSD, and F32AI80111 to SH. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
